Question
========

About 10% of people in the Netherlands aged 17 to 23 years are early school leavers. If you randomly choose five people from this age group then random variable X: the number of early school leavers. What then is the probability distribution of X? \ A:\

  ------ -------- -------- -------- -------- -------- X*i* 0 1 2 3 4 Odds 0.5905 0.3280 0.0729 0.0081 0.0004 ------ -------- -------- -------- -------- --------

 \ B:\

  ------ -------- -------- -------- -------- -------- X*i* 1 2 3 4 5 Odds 0.3280 0.0729 0.0081 0.0004 0.0001 ------ -------- -------- -------- -------- --------

 \ C:       \

  ------ -------- -------- -------- -------- -------- -------- X*i* 0 1 2 3 4 5 Odds 0.0001 0.0004 0.0081 0.0729 0.3280 0.5905 ------ -------- -------- -------- -------- -------- --------

          \ D:\

  ------ -------- -------- -------- -------- -------- -------- X*i* 0 1 2 3 4 5 Odds 0.5905 0.3280 0.0729 0.0081 0.0004 0.0001 ------ -------- -------- -------- -------- -------- --------

 \ E:\

  ------ -------- -------- -------- -------- -------- -------- X*i* 1 2 3 4 5 6 Odds 0.5905 0.3280 0.0729 0.0081 0.0004 0.0001 ------ -------- -------- -------- -------- -------- --------

Answerlist
----------

* A
* B
* C
* D
* E

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* A: Incorrect
* B: Incorrect
* C: Incorrect
* D: Correct
* E: Incorrect
